name: The little world behind the wall
name_original: The little world behind the wall
description:
Well, as the name implies, it's a mini-game about the little world behind our walls where we find all kinds of insects … or animals …

Giving it some context, is about saving our spider friends (and our character) from the chemicals used by the fumigators.

made for Ludum Dare 38

Theme: A Small World

Guatemala, 2017
